Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add stop/transcript debugging and fix TS errors

- Show STOP:HAS_TEXT or STOP:EMPTY when red button pressed
- Show NO_TRANSCRIPT if no speech was captured
- Show PROC:"text" with actual transcript captured
- Show RESP_OK when response spoken
- Tell user "No speech captured - try again" if empty
- Fix TypeScript errors with SpeechRecognition types

This will show if:
1. Stop button was pressed \(STOP:xxx\)
2. Whether any transcript was captured \(HAS_TEXT vs EMPTY\)
3. What text was actually captured \(PROC:"..."\)
4. If response was spoken \(RESP_OK\)

Now we can see if the issue is:
- Recognition not hearing speech \(AUDIO_START but no SOUND_START\)
- Or not transcribing \(SOUND_START but transcript is EMPTY\)

Desktop unchanged.
EOF
\)")
